import React,{useState} from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' export default function Update() { const redirect = useNavigate() const navigateHome = ()=>{ red } const [title, setTitle]=useState() const [author, setAuthor]=useState() const [cover, setCover]=useState() function saveChanges(e) { e.preventDefault() console.log(title) console.log(author) console.log(cover) } return (

setTitle(e.target.value)} required />
